column1: Table 1-31: Condition of Rail Transit Infrastructure (Percent)

Percents may not add to 100 due to rounding.

U.S. Department of Transportation, Federal Transit Administration, Status of the Nation's Highways, Bridges and Transit: Conditions and Performance (Washington, DC: Biennial Issues), tables 3-35 and 3-36, available at http://www.fhwa.dot.gov/pubstats.html as of June 25, 2010.
